page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most people work locally within a 2 to 5 mile radius.The greatest travelling distance to and from work involves a 40 mile round trip.Some people travel as part of their work.People use their own transport or that supplied by their employer. Most people start work after 8am.and finish by 5pm.Afew work in the evenings as bar maids.6am.is the earliest time for work to commence. There is very little unemployment in the area,there are opportunities for seasonal work at Wallington Hall and the Mart.
